Hi, my name is Jarrod Pelkofer. I currently work as a Business Analyst at Northwestern Mutual in Milwaukee, WI. I am a graduate student in the Master's of Data Science program through the University of Wisconsin system. Details on the program can be found here:
<https://datasciencedegree.wisconsin.edu/>

I am married to my wife Mary. We have a daughter, Rori (1 year old), a dog name Clay, and another baby girl on the way in July of 2020!
